article_title: 1 in 4 Doctors Aren't Coordinating Care Despite Obamacare Demands

article_metadata.description: About one in four U.S. physicians are not prepared to effectively manage and coordinate the care of patients who have multiple chronic conditions, a troubling finding in a new Commonwealth Fund study that comes as insurers move to value-based care models. The ability of doctors to manage chronic conditions like diabetes, [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
